AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: bedrooms
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Prefabs that include beds, end tables, dressers, etc

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: animals
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Barns, animal rooms, anything that is related to pets, livestock or similar

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: full houses
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Complete houses with a bedroom, a living room / dining room and optionally other accessory rooms, such as a kitchen

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: food
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Living rooms, kitchens, taverns. Anything having to do with the consumption of food or beverages

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: healthcare
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Hospitals, medicine rooms, triage rooms, drug labs. Anything having to do with colonist health. Note that this category will be more expensive in the USA

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: nature
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Farms, parks, hydroponics facilities. Anything related to either crops or nature

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: power
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Power generation and storage, as well as related things such as gas or chemfuel networks

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: prisons
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Prefabs including ways to handle prisoners

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: production
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Prefabs consisting of production facilities of all kinds
